metadata.subject: France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
Finance, Public
metadata.title: Arrêtés de la nation, et copie très-exacte de la lettre adressée à M.E. Nairac : datée du mercredi 15 juillet 1789.
metadata.creator: France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
France. Assemblée nationale constituante (1789-1791)
Nairac, Pierre-Paul, 1732-1812?
metadata.description: Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
Consists of a declaration by the Assemblée nationale, followed by a letter describing the political situation following the storming of the Bastille
"Lettre de M. Nairac, député aux États-généraux, datée de Versailles, le mercredi 15 juillet 1789, à 4 heures du soir, adressée à M.E. Nairac"--P. 3-8
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page is on the cover. Damaged, stained, and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
